articles.author: Kevin Mitchell
articles.title: Rafael Nadal defies pain and his father’s pleas to quit in epic win over Taylor Fritz - The Guardian
articles.description: Rafael Nadal prevailed over the American Taylor Fritz in a fluctuating five-set quarter-final at Wimbledon to set up a semi-final against Nick Kyrgios
articles.content:
Wimbledon 2022
  • Spaniard faces Kyrgios in semi after 3-6, 7-5, 3-6, 7-5, 7-6 (4) win
  • Nadal: The abdominal is not going well, it was not easy at all

articles.author: Christopher Clarey
articles.title: Rafael Nadal Prevails at Wimbledon In Grueling Win Over Taylor Fritz - The New York Times
articles.description: Nadal struggled with an abdominal injury in his grueling quarterfinal victory over Taylor Fritz, a rising American star who pushed Nadal to five sets.
articles.content: For a lot of moments, I was thinking maybe I will not be able to finish the match, he said, speaking to the Centre Court crowd. But, I dont know, the court, the energy, something else, so yes, thanks… [+694 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: COVID was the leading cause of death in Americans aged 45-54 in 2021 - Ars Technica
articles.description: About 1 in 8 US deaths were from COVID-19 between March 2020 and October 2021.
articles.content: Enlarge/ A woman watches white flags on the National Mall on September 18, 2021 in Washington, DC. Over 660,000 white flags were installed here to honor Americans who have lost their lives to COVID-1… [+2674 chars]
